apps.localizedDescription:
Wolf is an updated Facebook tweak with powerful features! You can access the tweak settings in Facebook's settings page.

FEATURES:
• No feed ads
• No story ads
• Disable marking messages as seen
• Disable typing status in messages
• Disable marking stories
• Disable auto-advance in stories
• Save Story images and videos
• Save Feed videos by long-pressing the video

NOTES:
• I'm not the developer of Wolf. This is not an official version of Wolf.
• Michael Lema, the developer of Wolf,  hasn't updated Wolf for a while. Expect some features may not work correctly.
• Requires iOS 11 and later.
apps.name: Facebook Wolf
apps.subtitle: A tweaked version of "Wolf" (made by Michael Lema)

apps.localizedDescription:
Full infomation about BHTwitterPlus (BHTwitter+) is available on my Github: https://github.com/qnblackcat/BHTwitter-Plus_Sideloaded/

Credits: 
- BandarHL - for BHTwitter and his solution for Twitter-login (Sideload).
- haoict - developer of Twitter No Ads.
- Tanner B - solution for Skip Analytics URL (t.co).

Kwown issues:
- "Skip Analytic URL" breaks embed pictures as described here.
- Analytics link in cards can't be skipped.
- Download videos may not work if you use appdb. In that case, please change the "Identity type to use for appdb PRO" in the "appdb configuration" from Auto to Development.
apps.name: BHTwitterPlus (BHTwitter+)
apps.subtitle: The sideloaded version of BHTwitter, made by @BandarHL (requires iOS 13.4+)
apps.versionDescription:
The changelog can be found at
https://github.com/qnblackcat/BHTwitter-Plus_Sideloaded/releases/

apps.localizedDescription:
Unfortunately, AltStore can not handle two applications that have the same bundle ID (uYou+ and Cercube+). I have no other choice except to modify CercubePlus's bundle ID. As a result, you won't be able to install CercubePlus directly through AltStore. You still can download the IPA like normal though.

Full infomation about CercubePlus (Cercube+) is available on my Github: https://github.com/qnblackcat/CercubePlus/

Credits: Please keep the Credits if you re-up CercubePlus! 
- Alfhaily for Cercube.
- Galactic-Dev for the original iSponsorBlock, @Luewii for his fork of iSponsorBlock (which works in jailed mode).
- PoomSmart for YouRememberCaption, YTClassicVideoQuality, YTNoCheckLocalNetwork, YTSystemAppearance, YTUHD and YouPiP.
- level3tjg for YTNoHoverCards.
Lillie for YouTube Dislike Return.

Known issues:
- Hide Cast button may not work.
- YTUHD: Stuttering on 2K/4K videos.
- YouPiP (iOS 14.0 - 14.4.2): due to Apple's fault, you may encounter the speedup-bug as described here. The bug also happens when you try to play multi-sources of sound at the same time. Enable Legacy PiP is a workaround. Note that Legacy PiP removes UHD quality and breaks the default video quality feature of uYou. Use it at your own risk!
apps.name: CercubePlus (Cercube+)
apps.subtitle: Cercube with extra features! (requires iOS 13.0 and later)
apps.versionDescription:
The changelog can be found at
https://github.com/qnblackcat/CercubePlus/releases
